column2: Lethargic, rapid respiration, extremely rounded head
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Tumor was slightly fluid filled; 90% solid tumor
Skull was completely broken through towards frontal lobe, skull was extremely soft and brain was slightly mushy
1 tumor chunk was frozen for cryogenics.
Heart and lungs looked like enlarged and there were small nodes upon visual inspection.
